insert.foreach: insert into cart (itemNo, cartCnt, cartOpt, userNo) values (#{carts.itemNo}, #{carts.cartCnt}, #{carts.cartOpt}, #{carts.userNo})

mapper.select: select count(cartNo) from cart where userNo = #{userNo}

select c.cartNo, c.itemNo, c.cartCnt, c.cartOpt, i.itemName, i.itemPrice, e.evPer, i.itemImg from cart c join item i on c.itemNo = i.itemNo left outer join event e on i.evNo = e.evNo where c.userNo = #{userNo}
mapper.delete: delete from cart where cartNo = #{cartNo} and userNo = #{userNo};
